changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_TIMESERIES_HEADER_ID DEFAULT NEWID(), START_TIME DATETIMEOFFSET NOT NULL, END_TIME DATETIMEOFFSET NOT NULL, IMPORT_TIME DATETIMEOFFSET NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_TIMESERIES_HEADER_IMPORT_TIME DEFAULT GETUTCDATE() INDEX IX_TIMESERIES_HEADER_IMPORT_TIME, TASK_COMPLETION_TIME DATETIMEOFFSET NOT NULL INDEX IX_TIMESERIES_HEADER_TASK_COMPLETION_TIME, TASK_RUN_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL INDEX IX_TIMESERIES_HEADER_TASK_RUN_ID, WORKFLOW_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL INDEX IX_TIMESERIES_HEADER_WORKFLOW_ID, MESSAGE NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_TIMESERIES_HEADER PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (ID) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER
